startup.sdescription: Pharmaceutical company developing inhibitors for safer and more effective anti-inflammatories for treatment of sinusitis, pain, cardiovascular, respiratory indications and cancer.
Digital high resolution and high throughput PCR system
Novel technology for high-yield production of biologic RNA agents for improved RNA therapeutics
Cellular therapeutic using engineered cells to specifically attack metastatic cancer cells and halt malignant metastasis.
Enabling more efficient RNA-seq library synthesis for diagnostics, pharmaceutical development and food security.
Develops genetically modified food crops for increased efficiency and reduced environmental impact.
RNA-based molecular biology and nano-technology to identify pathogens
Developing a textile that stays dry by attaching a network of water-attracting threads to water-repellent fabric.
Developing ceramic and semiconductor blades only a few atoms thick, with integrated micro-capillaries to allow for lubricating fluid flow.
Mitochondrial targeted therapeutics for orphan disease indications
startup.sname: Beiwe Pharma Mitochondrial targeted therapeutics for orphan disease indications

startup.sdescription: Direct production of sugar acids and oligomers from cellulosic biomass
High throughput cardiotoxicity screening and high content cardiac function assays
Novel medical devices to optimize the care of the critically ill and wounded, improving ventilation, fluid administration and hemorrhage control
Designing, developing and manufacturing a line of extremely low-power, ultrasonic 3D-sensing solutions for gesture recognition in consumer electronics, smart homes and industrial automation.
Developing a platform technology to optimize gene expression for agriculturally significant traits in crop plants & livestock.
Developing evidence-based digital therapies in mixed reality video game form to reduce cognitive impairments
Developing and marketing advanced plug-in hybrid electric vehicle and battery electric vehicle drivetrain solutions for the global automotive industry.
Developing the next generation of microbiome-based solutions to establish, restore, and maintain a healthy human gut microbiome.
Development of Furan Fatty Acids (FuFAs), naturally occurring lipids in fish oils, as nutraceuticals and pharmaceuticals that could protect cardiovascular health
Biotech company with highly effective enzymatic approaches for high yield and cost-effective production of complex glycans.
Vitamin, antioxidant and bioactive compound stabilizer and delivery system for food, nutraceutical and cosmetic products.
Developing novel stem cell delivery platforms for regeneration of brain tissue in patients suffering from traumatic brain injury, stroke, dementia and neurodegenerative disorders.
New CT scanner and imaging algorithms for imaging breast tissue.
Repurposing the tobacco plant to manufacture vaccines and therapeutics to improve quality of life.
Provides storage and analysis solutions for management of large data systems, including unbiased high-resolution identification and surveillance of human and other species genome/DNA.
Development and rapid translation of companion diagnostics and therapeutics
Developing advanced research tools for cultivating and growing cells in three dimensions.
Developing a resorbable and injectable delivery vehicle that localizes cells at the defect site and promotes tissue repair.
A novel slide-free microscope technology for research and diagnostic applications.
Development of engineered enzymes to treat Celiac disease

Develops beta-solenoid proteins as “molecular legos” for applications in self-assembly of nanoparticle based devices and materials, environmental remediation and passive mining, structured catalysis and potential tissue engineering.
Industrial mass production of inexpensive photosensors, photosensor arrays, and radiation detectors
Develops life-changing therapies to treat rare central nervous system (CNS) disorders.
Developing chemical sensors and information systems designed to identify specific chemicals in volatile, aerosol or liquid form.
Treatments for osteoporosis and inflammatory arthritis, particularly rheumatoid arthritis.
Creating advanced platform for local drug activation.
Preventing arthritis after injury
Focused on advancing novel therapeutics for high-mortality cancers; initial goal is to develop a first-in-class treatment for glioblastoma multiforme (GBM).
Wireless sensor network architecture to improve energy efficiency and reduce power and cooling costs in data centers. Company was acquired by Panduit in 2014.
Technology that removes the immunological barriers in animal-derived tissues, rendering them immune-compatible with human patients.
Provides site-specific irrigation monitoring and recommendations to efficiently meet agricultural production goals.
Developing a telemedicine-sensing device that provides feedback to patients and physicians in the diagnosis and treatment of chronic venous insufficiencies.
Early detection and rapid response to critical agricultural disease infestations
A non-invasive portable screening methodology and device for detecting traumatic brain injury.
